pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Stone Edge (move)" - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Description Stone Edge deals damage and has an increased critical hit ratio. It may also hit Pokémon when they are airborne while using the move Fly.
